body:
Hi folks,


I've been talking to a book author about including some case studies of
using OpenStudio and Radiance (and the glare sensor) in the real world. I
know many of you over the last year or so have started using the Radiance
bits we've added to OpenStudio, and I was wondering if anyone had some
good material for an OpenStudio case study for his book.


Let me know! 


- Rob




Rob Guglielmetti
National Renewable Energy Laboratory (NREL)
Commercial Buildings Research Group
15013 Denver West Parkway MS:RSF202
Golden, CO 80401
303.275.4319
robert.guglielmetti at nrel.gov
___
